overview:
Thomas R. Leitzke, Senior Vice President of Supply Chain and Manufacturing Operations, is responsible for developing and executing an integrated supply chain strategy, to build a strong operations talent base and lead daily operations. In this position Tom reports directly to Stephen S. Schwartz, CEO.

Mr. Leitzke joined Brooks in July 2010 and brings to Brooks significant global sourcing and international experience. He was previously a senior operations executive for Siemens Information Systems, Applied Materials, Inc., Asyst Technologies and Silicon Graphics, Inc.
